column5: Wonder if Frabill make a cradle that size
Awesome video and from what I can tell, not fake.  http://www.break.com/index/just-some-fishing-when-holy-crap-shark-2344129  I wouldn't be taking any swims off that dock!
Wow is all I can say.I guess so important for the net to get it first time.LOL.Good times I see.
So what was it?
lol i think they filled their undies there...Great vid!!!
They talk funny
That's pretty much exactly how I'd react...
Wow! Great footage! What lives under your dock? Swimming anyone?
And my girlfriend gets freaked out when there's a snapping turtle by the dock...LOL
Awesome! but why are they breaking off the shark? a good fisherman would try to land it!  http://www.theage.com.au/travel/travel-news/shark-follows-kayaker-as-jaws-fears-hit-us-20120710-21svg.html
"I got it on Camera" that's too funny.
Found this while surfing the net.  Caution: contains language that may be offensive to some.  http://thechive.com/2012/07/11/fishing-when-all-of-a-sudden-video/  I would probably react the same way.
This was just posted...
Now that's pretty cool , I would have used BIGGER words for sure!
Try and land that?  Anyone know where this was and what kind of Shark it was?
I don't think they had much say in the matter.
That was one big Shawk
That one they wont forget for a while.  You see it on fishing shows all the time.  But that's the first I seen one come from around a dock shore fishing like that.  Very cool!
The big one that got away.
Everybody out of the pool!
The type of shark was a BFS.  Big Freakin Shark.  It jumped so I guess maybe a Mako.  I am going to try and pause it to see if I can Identify it.
Maybe it is a bronze whaler but its shape actually makes it look like a Great white
Makos don't come in land like that...  Id say it's a Bull shark!
Looks like a bull to me too...they are notorious for entering freshwater rivers too, one of the few sharks that can.
Agreed on bull shark.  Short snout and small dorsal fin, and they're native to the US Southeast coast.  She should have landed it.
anyone just see this on sportsnet?
